Who Are We?

Stephen Green

Teetering on Libertarian philosophy, Stephen Green is a socially conservative Christian who is passionite about gun rights and freedom of speech.

Tait Hoyem

A pro-life atheist, Tait Hoyem is a social liberal who believes in 'live and let live'. Tait is passionite about the state of government surveillance and free speech.

Danny Kanter

A multicultural oddity being a redheaded Mexican (who likes it spicy!), Danny is a pro-life, true conservative who is passionate about apologetics, good food and makin' funny!
